job_history.work_description: Processed applications, payments, corrections, endorsements and cancellations. Submitted up-to-date activity and production logs to agency management for review. Presented and clearly explained insurance policy options to clients based on their needs and goals. Called 20-30 lapsed customers each day to inquire about continuing needs. Handled escalated calls. Researched cases, pay by phone, handled vendor return unit calls and also took Supervisor calls. Became a researcher/Supervisor within 3 months of start date.

Recruited an average of 7 new participants each month. Explained exercise modifications and contraindicated movements to participants with a history of injury. Cultivated positive relationships with participants by interacting with them during group fitness classes. Greeted all members in a professional and friendly manner. Developed safe and effective exercise programs for all members. Explained class objectives and rules.

Effectively managed a high-volume of inbound and outbound customer calls. Answered a constant flow of customer calls with up to 30 calls in queue per minute. Acted professionally and patiently when addressing negative customer feedback.
Assessed clients' financial situations to develop strategic financial planning solutions.

Promoted good behavior by using the positive reinforcement method. Promoted language development skills through reading and storytelling. Assisted the lead teacher with snack time, arts and crafts and putting the children down for naps. Relieved the head teacher and toddler teacher. Dressed children and changed diapers. Communicated regularly with parents about daily activities and behaviors. Offered parents detailed daily reports that outlined their child's day. Maintained daily records of children's individual activities, behaviors, meals and naps. Maintained a child-friendly environment by allowing frequent access to outdoor activities. Sparked imagination by helping children discover new things each day.

Effectively managed a high-volume of inbound and outbound customer calls. Answered a constant flow of customer calls with up to 25 calls in queue per minute. Addressed and resolved customer product complaints empathetically and professionally. Defused volatile customer situations calmly and courteously. Accurately documented, researched and resolved customer service issues. Mastery of customer service management systems and databases. Managed customer calls effectively and efficiently in a complex, fast-paced and challenging call center environment. Identified chronic customer issues by creating and maintaining customer complaint log. Referred unresolved customer grievances to designated departments for further investigation. Managed high call volume with tact and professionalism. Acted professionally and patiently when addressing negative customer feedback.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in handling high-volume customer calls, resolving customer complaints, and managing customer service issues across multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated strong communication skills through effective interactions with customers, parents, and colleagues, showcasing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Successfully resolved customer complaints, managed complex customer issues, and identified chronic customer problems, indicating strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed high-volume customer calls, maintained daily records, and handled multiple responsibilities, demonstrating strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills through supervisory roles, recruitment, and team management, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Maintained daily records, documented customer service issues, and managed customer complaint logs, indicating a solid working proficiency in data entry.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Assessed clients' financial situations to develop strategic financial planning solutions, but limited experience in this area, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Child Development
skills.explanation: Promoted good behavior, language development skills, and maintained a child-friendly environment, but limited experience in this area, suggesting some practical experience.
